{"step_by_step_thinking": "Succinylcholine and Decamethonium are depolarising muscle relaxants, so they can be eliminated. Pancuronium is a long-acting non-depolarising muscle relaxant. Therefore, the only option left is Mivacurum, which is a short-acting non-depolarising muscle relaxant.", "answer_choice": "C. Mivacurum"}
